question: Who of the following has been appointed as the next Ambassador of India to the Kingdom of Norway?
explanation: Krishan Kumar was appointed as the next Ambassador of India to the Kingdom of Norway. Krishan Kumar is an Indian Foreign Service (IFS) Officer of the 1984 batch. He is at present the Ambassador of India to the Czech Republic. He has been appointed as the next Ambassador of India to the Kingdom of Norway. He will take up this assignment shortly.
